headline: How we brought HTTPS Everywhere to the cloud (part 1)
keywords: HTTPS, Mixed Content Errors, SSL, HTTP2, Product News, Security, Crypto Week
description: CloudFlare's mission is to make HTTPS accessible for all our customers. It provides security for their websites, improved ranking on search engines, better performance with HTTP/2, and access to browser features such as geolocation that are being deprecated for plaintext HTTP.
